title: Cannot connect to PvP.net
body:
Every time I try to login I get this message despite there being no server issues.

Connection Failure: Unable to connect to PvP.net server.

If anyone can help that would be nice

replies.body: Are you still having this issue?  If so, check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case your network is having trouble connecting to the chat servers.  Hopefully, all is well now!
The game still does not work for me. And the link doesn't work for me either
The link never works for me. I am not sure why.
Im getting the exact same issue. Ive tried everything. does it just kind of sit there for a minute and then flash the notification?
